Protocols/ScratchCardViewDelegate.html#/.name: coverView(for:)
Protocols/ScratchCardViewDelegate.html#/.abstract: The top view of the scratch card. Covers the content view.

Protocols/ScratchCardViewDelegate.html#/.name: contentView(for:)
Protocols/ScratchCardViewDelegate.html#/.abstract: The content view of the scratch card.

Protocols/ScratchCardViewDelegate.html#/.name: scratchCardViewDidEndScratching(_:)
Protocols/ScratchCardViewDelegate.html#/.abstract: Called when current scratches stop (user lifts his finger)

Classes/ScratchCardView.html#/c:@M@Scrat.name: scratchWidth
Classes/ScratchCardView.html#/c:@M@Scrat.abstract: The width of the scratch. Default is 30.

Classes/ScratchCardView.html#/s:15Scratc.name: scratchPercent
Classes/ScratchCardView.html#/s:15Scratc.abstract: The percent of total view area that is revealed by the scratches.

Classes/ScratchCardView.html#/s:15Scratc.name: clear()
Classes/ScratchCardView.html#/s:15Scratc.abstract: Clears the scratches from the current view

Classes/ScratchCardView.html#/s:15Scratc.name: reloadView()
Classes/ScratchCardView.html#/s:15Scratc.abstract: Clears the scratches and asks the delegate for a new cover and contant views
